Simple Chat Server With Socket.IO
=====================

Simple chat server with Socket.IO for educational purposes.
Read full article here: http://afshinm.name/blog/?p=66

How to use
=====================

1) Download the code  
2) Open Terminal  
3) Go to `/server`  
4) Run `node server.js`  
5) Go to `/client` and open `index.html`
